QueryResult.text: SELECT JOB.NAME JOB_NAME, JOB.JOB_DEFINITION_ID, JCODE.NAME JOB_TYPE, JOB.ID JOB_ID, JOB.STATUS_CODE, JSTATUS.NAME JOB_STATUS, JOB.SCHEDULE_DATE, JOB.RECURRENCE_TYPE, JCODE.LANGUAGE_CODE FROM CMN_SCH_JOBS JOB, CMN_SCH_JOB_DEFINITIONS DEF, CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS JCODE, CMN_LOOKUPS_V JSTATUS WHERE JOB.JOB_DEFINITION_ID = DEF.ID AND JCODE.TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_SCH_JOB_DEFINITIONS' AND JCODE.PK_ID = DEF.ID and JOB.STATUS_CODE = JSTATUS.LOOKUP_CODE AND JSTATUS.LOOKUP_TYPE = 'SCH_JOB_STATUS' AND JSTATUS.LANGUAGE_CODE = JCODE.LANGUAGE_CODE
